title: If You Have Problems With League of Legends Since Patch 8.1

replies.body:
Ayyyyy lookit you trying to help out your fellow Summoners ^_^! 

It's always worth it to do some quick troubleshooting in a custom/practice game while waiting for a response here or in a ticket.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7E3em7t5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-14T23:54:00.283+0000)
>
> Ayyyyy lookit you trying to help out your fellow Summoners ^_^! 
> 
> It's always worth it to do some quick troubleshooting in a custom/practice game while waiting for a response here or in a ticket.

Yeah. Hopefully all of these problems that are so alike with a lot of people recently can be fixed before the 16th..

Little confused here, were there any specific issues you were having as well? 

The steps listed in the post mentioned above are general troubleshooting steps that anyone could use for a wide variety of problems that may arise. These issues don't have any specific overall fix, as they're related to network problems we all experience from time to time.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7E3em7t5,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-15T04:16:29.586+0000)
>
> Little confused here, were there any specific issues you were having as well? 
> 
> The steps listed in the post mentioned above are general troubleshooting steps that anyone could use for a wide variety of problems that may arise. These issues don't have any specific overall fix, as they're related to network problems we all experience from time to time.

Sure, maybe just network problems. But since the last patch I've been seeing a lot of the same problems and there doesn't seem to be a thread for that. :( I've nothing better to do lately since There hasn't been any new Guild Wars 2 content so I've been payng attention to the forums a lot.
it drops throughout the game even when I'm not running obs.  I didn't have this problem until recently.  When i try to stream or record it just makes it worse.

I know there have been multiple post about this but i'm getting real bad fps drop.  I can't stream or record cause my fps goes to like 40 fps from 190-200 range.  Is there any word on a fix for this?  Thanks

For your case, I'd want to see what your FPS looks like without any streaming software running. If you only get drops like this with other programs running it could just be caused by those programs eating up resources.
